password_hasher module¶

Module responsible for secure password hashing and verification.

class password_hasher.PasswordHasher[source]¶

Bases: object

Static class for hashing and verifying user passwords. Uses bcrypt algorithm.

static hash(password: str) → str[source]¶

Hashes user password using bcrypt.

Parameters:

password (str) – Password to hash.

Returns:

Hashed password.

Return type:

str

static verify(password_input: str, password_from_users_data: str) → bool[source]¶

Verifies if provided password matches the hashed password.

Parameters:

  • password_input (str) – Input password.

  • password_from_users_data (str) – Hashed password from database.

Returns:

True if passwords match, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool
